newsitem.title: UK: Energy heads could leave with one mln stg - paper.
newsitem.headline: Energy heads could leave with one mln stg - paper.

text.p: Two senior directors of Energy Group Plc will walk away with cash bonuses and compensation packages worth more than one million stg each if they decide not to stay with the company after the proposed 3.7 billion stg takeover by PacifiCorp of the U.S., the Independent said.

The newspaper said formal offer documents to Energy Group shareholders showed Derek Bonham, executive chairman since the group's demerger from Hanson Plc earlier this year would receive 1.49 million stg.
John Devaney, chief executive of Eastern, the regional power company, would leave with 1.16 million stg, the paper said.
Documents also showed that the normal one-year notice period for executives leaving the company would be extended to two years in the event of a takeover. --London Newsroom +44 171 542 5106
